name: Hill Transporter Truck Challen
description:
Hill Transporter Truck Challenge is cargo truck transport simulator aimes at the successful transportation of the 3d cargo. You need to pick up the indian cargo using trailer and loads it into the indian truck driving simulator.
Features
- Truck simulator physics
- Esay and smooth controls of the game.
- Challenging missions.
- Realistic sounds of truck driving.
- More fun of heavy truck driving.
